about_the_game:
Alehouse Tavern Simulator invites you into a vibrant fantasy world where your tavern is more than just a gathering place—it's the heart of your adventure! As the tavern keeper, you’ll manage daily life while diving into thrilling activities and exploring the magical surroundings.

Fish in nearby streams, hunt in the wilderness, tend to your small farm, raise pigs and chickens for fresh ingredients, and harvest vegetables from your own garden to craft delicious meals and brews that delight your patrons. Chop wood to fuel your kitchen and keep the tavern warm and inviting for your guests.

Enemies won’t always respect the peace of your establishment. Creatures may target your tavern, and you’ll need to defend it. Take on quests, equip yourself with weapons, and protect your patrons and livelihood from harm.

Whether you're whipping up a legendary stew, chopping wood like a lumberjack on a mission, or fending off bandits who clearly didn’t read the “no fighting in the tavern” sign, Alehouse Tavern Simulator serves up endless charm and adventure. Will you become the kingdom's most beloved tavern keeper? Or will you just end up with a lot of angry chickens and broken mugs? The choice is yours—pour yourself an ale and get to it!
